entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Muncho Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Light snow ending after midnight then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12 except minus 20 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12 except minus 20 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19 except minus 25 in low lying areas. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19 except minus 25 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
